document.full_text: lovemore moyo, of the movement for democratic change, had been elected speaker of the country's parliament in 2008, but his victory was invalidated three weeks ago on a legal technicality.
document.title: zimbabwe lawmakers pick mugabe rival for post
lines_and_colors: lovemore moyo, of the movement for democratic change, had been elected speaker of the country's parliament in 2008, but his victory was invalidated three weeks ago on a legal technicality.
